description:
Just when it seems that the battle against the Empire has been won, Mitsuha is faced with her most fearsome foe yet: a powerful ancient dragon who has been the mastermind behind the invasion all along!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Isekai de Hachimanmai no Kinka o Tamemasu
異世界で8万枚の金貨を貯めます
